title: Putham Puthu Malare Song Lyrics Amaravathi
stanzas:
Putham pudhu malare
en aasai sollavaa..
pothi vaithu maraithaen
en baashai sollavaa

sella kili ennai
kulippikka vendum.
selai thalaipin
thuvattida vendum

kalluch silai pola
nee nirkka vendum
kangal paarthu
thalai vaara vendum

nee vandhu ilai
poda vendum.
naan vandhu
parimaara vendum

en imai un vizhi
mooda vendum
iruvarum oru swaram
paada vendum

kanni undhan madi
saaya vendum
kamban varigal
nee solla vendum

unnai katti kondu
thoonga vendum
undhan Â viral
thalai kodhida vendum

udhattukkum udhattukkum
dhooram vendum
uyirukkul uyir sendru
saera vendum

Putham pudhu malare
en aasai sollavaa..
pothi vaithu maraithaen
en baashai sollavaa

seo.title: Putham Puthu Malare Song Lyrics Amaravathi
seo.description: Get the complete Putham Puthu Malare Song Lyrics Amaravathi from Amaravathi. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by Bala Bharathi and sung by SPB. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Amaravathi, Bala Bharathi, SPB, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
